sys_ux_macroponent.name: Request List Item
sys_ux_macroponent.props: [ { "description": "Bind a record object from a Repeater (recommended)", "fieldType": "object", "label": "Record (from Repeater)", "name": "record", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "", "description": "Request title (used if record is not provided)", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Title", "name": "title", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "", "description": "Request coordinator name", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Coordinator", "name": "coordinator", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "", "description": "Type of request", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Request Type", "name": "requestType", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "", "description": "Formatted request date", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Request Date", "name": "requestDate", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "", "description": "Record sys_id (optional)", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Sys ID", "name": "sysId", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "/people-info/{{sysId}}", "description": "Example: /people-info/{{sysId}}", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Target path template", "name": "targetPath", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": false, "description": "Open the link in a new browser tab", "fieldType": "boolean", "label": "Open in new tab", "name": "openInNewTab", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": false, "description": "Highlight this item as active/selected", "fieldType": "boolean", "label": "Active (selected state)", "name": "active", "valueType": "string" }, { "defaultValue": "sys_id", "description": "Which field in the bound record should be used as sysId (default: sys_id). Example: u_request_sys_id", "fieldType": "string", "label": "Sys ID field (from record)", "name": "sysIdField", "valueType": "string" } ]
